answers.answer: Cut back on carbs and eat smaller portions. Have a a snack in between meals and make sure that you check your numbers, especially your fasting. My fasting numbers were high and I eventually had to have insulin injections before going to bed. It really wasn't that bad though, the needle is small. You'll be okay. Don't worry!
